places.name: Hilton Vancouver Metrotown
places.description: Modern hotel with a heated rooftop pool & hot tub, plus a restaurant/lounge & meeting space.
places.address: Hilton Vancouver Metrotown, 6083 McKay Ave, Burnaby, BC V5H 2W7

featured_reviews.review_id:
A great hotel at a very good location for a reasonable price. Rooms are simple (for instance, the living room was pretty bare) but are well maintained and cleaned daily.

I stayed in a suite at a high floor. It offered an unblocked view of the Vancouver suburbs, with minimal tall buildings blocking the view.
featured_reviews.review_text:
A great hotel at a very good location for a reasonable price. Rooms are simple (for instance, the living room was pretty bare) but are well maintained and cleaned daily.

I stayed in a suite at a high floor. It offered an unblocked view of the Vancouver suburbs, with minimal tall buildings blocking the view.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Convenient location (close to transit, shopping and many restaurants).

Staff were friendly.  Lobby of hotel was very clean.

Room was okay.  Windows do not open so it felt stuffy.  AC was loud but had to keep it going overnight to keep  the temperature comfortable.  Micro fridge with no freezer for cold packs.  Nice deep bath tub but grout on tiled walls needed to be cleaned better.

Also, felt bad for the people with rooms right by the ice machine on my floor....it was very loud all the time.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Convenient location (close to transit, shopping and many restaurants).

Staff were friendly.  Lobby of hotel was very clean.

Room was okay.  Windows do not open so it felt stuffy.  AC was loud but had to keep it going overnight to keep  the temperature comfortable.  Micro fridge with no freezer for cold packs.  Nice deep bath tub but grout on tiled walls needed to be cleaned better.

Also, felt bad for the people with rooms right by the ice machine on my floor....it was very loud all the time.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lisa, thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We're glad to hear that you found our location convenient, lobby clean, and our staff friendly. However, we apologize for the maintenance issues and noise disturbances you encountered during your stay. We understand how important a peaceful and comfortable environment is for a good night's sleep, and we'll address these issues with our team. If you have any further details about your booking or would like to discuss your experience in more detail, please reach out to our support team at https://help.hilton.com/s/contactsupport or (604) 438-1200. We're here to assist you. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a more enjoyable stay.

featured_reviews.review_id: We just returned from our stay and could not be happier with our hotel experience.  This location was perfect for our needs. Several great restaurants across the street and the concierge did a great job helping us find everything.  The hotel rooms were spacious and clean. Prices were very reasonable.  This was a family trip to see Vancouver and we are so happy we chose this hotel.
featured_reviews.review_text: We just returned from our stay and could not be happier with our hotel experience.  This location was perfect for our needs. Several great restaurants across the street and the concierge did a great job helping us find everything.  The hotel rooms were spacious and clean. Prices were very reasonable.  This was a family trip to see Vancouver and we are so happy we chose this hotel.

featured_reviews.review_id: Room was spacious had a lounge chair in the room and a desk and chair and nice size tv.  The shower had shampoo and conditioner and body wash in there already so you don't have to bring your own and nice brand also.  The ac was quiet enough and room wasn't too warm as we went in the summer to this hotel. The Metrotown mall is right beside the hotel also Station Square lots of shopping and food right across the street great area for all.
featured_reviews.review_text: Room was spacious had a lounge chair in the room and a desk and chair and nice size tv.  The shower had shampoo and conditioner and body wash in there already so you don't have to bring your own and nice brand also.  The ac was quiet enough and room wasn't too warm as we went in the summer to this hotel. The Metrotown mall is right beside the hotel also Station Square lots of shopping and food right across the street great area for all.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jeff, thank you for sharing your positive experience with us at Hilton. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed the spacious room with its amenities, including the lounge chair, desk, and TV. It's great that you found the shower stocked with quality shampoo, conditioner, and body wash. We're also pleased to know that the AC kept the room comfortable during your summer stay. We appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back soon.

featured_reviews.review_id:
The rooms are clean, the bathtubs are amazing. We stayed there the night of our wedding and it was great

We misses breakfast and the lady in the kitchen made us breakfast anyway. Have a super nice the staff like above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable.
featured_reviews.review_text:
The rooms are clean, the bathtubs are amazing. We stayed there the night of our wedding and it was great

We misses breakfast and the lady in the kitchen made us breakfast anyway. Have a super nice the staff like above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Had a great stay here. Room was clean and comfortable, we had a suite which was nice. The Breakfast Buffet included for Gold Members was very good, lots of options. Location is super convenient next to the Skytrain (easy ride downtown) and malls/shopping. Price was a lot cheaper than staying downtown but still well located. Parking wasn't too bad for an urban area.

Only complaint is one morning, I think they only had one elevator running, and we literally waited on our floor for an elevator for about 15 minutes (5 minutes for the first which was already full, then another 10 for the second which had room). But I think that was a short lived problem, the rest of the stay we didn't have any issues.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id: Good location. Pool and hot tub are tiny, much smaller than expected, but it is nice to have the amenities. Room was big and kept very clean. Staff was friendly and inviting. Restaurant was very expensive (shocked to pay 5$ for a small size and average tasting coffee).
featured_reviews.review_text: Good location. Pool and hot tub are tiny, much smaller than expected, but it is nice to have the amenities. Room was big and kept very clean. Staff was friendly and inviting. Restaurant was very expensive (shocked to pay 5$ for a small size and average tasting coffee).
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nikki- We're glad to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and spacious, clean rooms. We apologize for any disappointment caused by the size of our pool and hot tub. Your comments about our friendly staff are greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you back soon.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Super clean and friendly staff. Not super conveniently located but they do have a few restaurants downstairs at the Crystal Mall. Parking is underground and confusing.
This might be my new hotel when I visit BC
The restaurant in the hotel(3rd floor) is also pretty good. The staff there are also super friendly.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Super clean and friendly staff. Not super conveniently located but they do have a few restaurants downstairs at the Crystal Mall. Parking is underground and confusing.
This might be my new hotel when I visit BC
The restaurant in the hotel(3rd floor) is also pretty good. The staff there are also super friendly.

places.name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver-Metrotown (Burnaby), an IHG Hotel
places.description: Contemporary lodging with an outdoor pool & an exercise room, plus a free breakfast bar & WiFi.

owner.name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver-Metrotown (Burnaby), an IHG Hotel (Owner)

places.address: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver-Metrotown (Burnaby), an IHG Hotel, 4405 Central Blvd, Burnaby, BC V5H 4M3

featured_reviews.review_id: I was impressed with the hotel from the moment I entered the door. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The little touches left in my room as a welcome made me feel like my business was appreciated. A nice breakfast brunch was included in the stay which was a nice addition.  The only criticism I'd give was the room was marketed as "top floor city view" and my window literally looked out onto the roof. Not much of a city view however the room itself was quite nice. Lots of great amenities near by including a very large shopping mall and the metro station.
featured_reviews.review_text: I was impressed with the hotel from the moment I entered the door. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The little touches left in my room as a welcome made me feel like my business was appreciated. A nice breakfast brunch was included in the stay which was a nice addition.  The only criticism I'd give was the room was marketed as "top floor city view" and my window literally looked out onto the roof. Not much of a city view however the room itself was quite nice. Lots of great amenities near by including a very large shopping mall and the metro station.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Michelle Grodecki,

Thank you for choosing us, we appreciate your positive feedback about we did to welcome you and our staff, we are always trying to do our best to deliver a good experience for you and also glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us due to it!

We hope your next stay is just around the corner, looking forward to welcoming you back soon Michelle Grodecki.


Scott J
General Manager

featured_reviews.review_id: Staying at the Holiday Inn Express in Metrotown was the best idea ever! The staff were really friendly and my wife and I were able to get everything we needed in walking distance. I just wish breakfast was until 11. We are a young couple so we like to sleep in a little bit while on vacation. The breakfast quality was not bad. A little bit overcooked but still enjoyable. The room was very comfortable. We also loved the fact that the rooms walls were soundproofed ;). We will definately be back again.
featured_reviews.review_text: Staying at the Holiday Inn Express in Metrotown was the best idea ever! The staff were really friendly and my wife and I were able to get everything we needed in walking distance. I just wish breakfast was until 11. We are a young couple so we like to sleep in a little bit while on vacation. The breakfast quality was not bad. A little bit overcooked but still enjoyable. The room was very comfortable. We also loved the fact that the rooms walls were soundproofed ;). We will definately be back again.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Reading those past reviews of unhappy customers makes me think they were in the wrong hotel.
My family and I booked a room but at the last minute had unexpected guests coming with us.
Brandon at the front desk was very pleasant to remind the hotel policy  that we can't be all in the same room. He offered we get another room at the lowest discounted price he could give us.
I also got the first room with the extra pillows as I requested weeks ahead. Holiday Inn is the best property for me!
featured_reviews.review_text:
Reading those past reviews of unhappy customers makes me think they were in the wrong hotel.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Tina Dolor,

We really appreciate the time dedicated and thank you for all the feedback and comments on your last stay.
Great to hear that you found our staff friendly and helpful and now we know that we are not the only ones who loves Brandon. He is so nice, right? We are glad to hear that we could make such as good experience for you and you enjoy your stay as a result.

We look forward to your next visit Tina Dolor.

Scott J
General Manager

featured_reviews.review_id: I appreciate this hotel makes an effort. The staff are well trained and courteous. They have a fantastic continental breakfast. The hotel is clean and well maintained. The outdoor pool is reasonably heated, and offers a comfortable swim. We used the fitness centre, and found the equipment clean and in good shape. We felt very secure in the building. The proximity to the skytrain station makes it easy to get around Vancouver. I would highly recommend this location.
featured_reviews.review_text: I appreciate this hotel makes an effort. The staff are well trained and courteous. They have a fantastic continental breakfast. The hotel is clean and well maintained. The outdoor pool is reasonably heated, and offers a comfortable swim. We used the fitness centre, and found the equipment clean and in good shape. We felt very secure in the building. The proximity to the skytrain station makes it easy to get around Vancouver. I would highly recommend this location.

featured_reviews.review_id: Central location in Metrotown with free parking and a breakfast with great service, clean food facilities and seating area, quality food offerings.  Of all the hotels with free breakfasts we have experienced, this was the best well done.  The room was super clean but the bathroom had a sour odor which the staff quickly addressed within hours by replacing the shower curtains.  Our room had a window which opens for fresh air which was great for sleeping.  Our room faces the sky train which can be noisy but stops  around midnight ( ear plugs are also supplied if needed ).
featured_reviews.review_text: Central location in Metrotown with free parking and a breakfast with great service, clean food facilities and seating area, quality food offerings.  Of all the hotels with free breakfasts we have experienced, this was the best well done.  The room was super clean but the bathroom had a sour odor which the staff quickly addressed within hours by replacing the shower curtains.  Our room had a window which opens for fresh air which was great for sleeping.  Our room faces the sky train which can be noisy but stops  around midnight ( ear plugs are also supplied if needed ).

featured_reviews.review_id:
Looks recently renovated so it's clean and modern. Super friendly people at the front desk, housekeeping and breakfast area on the second floor.

Quick note on the light switches, there's one in the room that's really hard to find and it controls the lighting above the bed - see the uploaded picture for a tiny black switch next to the wall power outlets.

Free parking underground is great and easy to access using the hotel elevators. If you get there late evening, you will need your hotel key card to open the gates. It's also part of a shopping mall so you have access to lots of food options.

Looking forward to a return trip!
featured_reviews.review_text:

Thank you for all the feedback and comments on your recent stay.
Great to hear that you were able to get around easily, you found our staff friendly and helpful and you enjoyed your stay very much.

We look forward to your next visit Francis S.


Scott J 
General Manager

featured_reviews.review_id: Nice and close to the mall and restaurants. Staff was friendly! Great breakfast. Parking is tight but we always found a spot. However, there were issues with our thermostat that did not get resolved before we left. Ended up just turning it off. I had a hard time falling asleep in the hot room. Cleaner threw out collectable empty beer bottles I was saving as souvenirs (I get they didn't know but it was a serious bummer).

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Ahmad, 

Thank you for your comments. I am sorry to hear of your dissatisfaction with your stay. Did you contact us so we could help with the heat in your room? Reviewing my departmental managers logs I do not see any report from the room you stayed in. Please feel free to contact front desk next time you decide to stay with us, we will be pleased to help you.

Warm regards, 

Scott Johnson 
General Manager

featured_reviews.review_id:
The hotel is perfectly located in the heart of Metrotown. Great dinning options at walking distance. 
Overall room was comfortable and clean, but the bathroom could use an update.
I stayed here for a planned trip to hike Grouse Mountain, and this location provided a nice short drive, allowing me to make the most out of the morning.
featured_reviews.review_text:
The hotel is perfectly located in the heart of Metrotown. Great dinning options at walking distance. 
Overall room was comfortable and clean, but the bathroom could use an update.

places.name: Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery
places.description: Quirky hotel offering cool rooms & suites, as well as a lounge, a restaurant & Wi-Fi.
places.address: Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery, 654 Nelson St, Vancouver, BC V6B 6K4

featured_reviews.review_id: My husband and I had a very pleasant stay. Staff were very friendly and ensured we were happy with our room by texting us shortly after going up to our room.  Room was very clean. Bed beautifully made with quality sheets that had that freshly laundered feel. Bathroom was extremely clean. Lovely big shower. Highly recommend Hotel Belmont. We would definitely stay there again.
featured_reviews.review_text: My husband and I had a very pleasant stay. Staff were very friendly and ensured we were happy with our room by texting us shortly after going up to our room.  Room was very clean. Bed beautifully made with quality sheets that had that freshly laundered feel. Bathroom was extremely clean. Lovely big shower. Highly recommend Hotel Belmont. We would definitely stay there again.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Dianne,

Thank you for choosing Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery! We're delighted to hear you and your husband enjoyed your stay. It's wonderful that our staff's friendliness and attention to detail, from the clean room to the quality sheets, made your experience memorable. We appreciate your recommendation and can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit!

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id: Myself and a friend stayed at the Hotel Belmont in the end of October. We checked in later in the evening as we had a 9 hour drive. Upon checking in we were greeted by staff who had seen us pull into the parking lot and park our car. They had also heard us talking about the parking lot and that we were impressed to find parking that late in the evening, as it took a very long time to check in. Upon checking in they asked all the usual questions. The hotel proceeded to text all throughout the night and next morning making sure everything was fine with our stay, which it was for the most part. We spent the evening coming and going from the hotel and making multiple trips to our vehicle which was parked in view from the lobby with the staff that had checked us in hours prior, and a friendly door person who checked on us each time which we appreciated as two young female travelers. The next morning we woke up early and when to grab something from the car, to find that the car was gone. We went back inside and had staff tell us that they had got the car towed because it was illegally parked. We went to retrieve the car and had to navigate our way around a large unfamiliar city to a not so nice side of town and had to pay over $160 for less then 12 hours of the car being there. Once we retrieved the car and found our way back to the hotel I went back in to figure out parking. I had to wait for the three staff members to bring out two more staff members before I even got to speak to them. Once their crew of five was ready I asked them what was up with the parking and why nobody had mentioned that we needed to purchase a ticket for parking and why nobody had bothered to tell us our car was being taken. They did don't have a response. They then tried to charge us extra for parking the night our car got towed, to which one of the workers told the person billing me to be nice and not overcharge. This was a horrible experience as we were on a time sensitive trip and this completely ruined our day timing wise. We had stayed there before with male counterparts and were treated much better, but when it was two young female they feel the need to try and get more money out of us and deceive us.

featured_reviews.review_id: Some say service standards these days are going backwards - well I would certainly say that is not the case at the Belmont. The service was outstanding. Each staff member that I interacted with were amazing, caring and very friendly. The hotel is in an exciting part of Vancouver with lots of nightlife, dining, etc. I loved the fun decor and attention to detail updating what looks to be an older building in Vancouver. I would stay again - and thank you to the incredible team working during my stay.
featured_reviews.review_text: Some say service standards these days are going backwards - well I would certainly say that is not the case at the Belmont. The service was outstanding. Each staff member that I interacted with were amazing, caring and very friendly. The hotel is in an exciting part of Vancouver with lots of nightlife, dining, etc. I loved the fun decor and attention to detail updating what looks to be an older building in Vancouver. I would stay again - and thank you to the incredible team working during my stay.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Deanne,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery! We're delighted to hear that you found our service outstanding and our team amazing, caring, and friendly. It's fantastic to know that you enjoyed our exciting location in Vancouver with its vibrant nightlife and dining options. We take pride in our attention to detail and the fun decor that breathes new life into our historic building. 

We can't wait to welcome you back, and a BIG thank you from the entire team for your kind words!

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id: We had the best experience at this hotel!! Every single detail was thought out -whether we needed to borrow an umbrella to walk to dinner or borrow bikes, they had it all. The kindest staff ever and always willing to go above and beyond (I wish I remembered specific names but honestly it was everyone)! So so accommodating and provided awesome recommendations. We also loved the access to the restaurant/bar and we didn't hear any music or noise from our room on the 5th floor. The room was spacious, clean and luxurious. We loved the cute details and decor in both the lobby and room. Not to mention the location was great and we were walking distance to all restaurants/activities we wanted to try. I could not recommend this hotel more!! We will be coming back and recommending to all of our friends.
featured_reviews.review_text: We had the best experience at this hotel!! I could not recommend this hotel more!! We will be coming back and recommending to all of our friends.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Ann, 

Wow! Your review made our day! We're absolutely thrilled to hear about your amazing experience at our hotel. It's fantastic to know that every detail contributed to making your stay special. Our team takes great pride in going the extra mile, and we're overjoyed to have met your expectations.

We're delighted you found our staff accommodating and enjoyed the recommendations. It's fantastic to hear that you found the room luxurious, clean, and loved the little details in both the room and lobby. Your kind words mean the world to us, and we can't wait to welcome you back and host your friends too! Thank you for recommending us!

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id:
I had during my recent stay at your hotel. My stay was truly memorable, and I felt compelled to share my positive feedback.

From the moment I entered the lobby, I was impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere. The check-in process was smooth, and your staff members were not only professional but also incredibly friendly. Their attention to detail and commitment to guest satisfaction were evident throughout my entire stay.

The room I stayed in exceeded my expectations in every way. The cleanliness, modern amenities, and thoughtful touches in the room contributed to a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The attention to detail in the room's design and furnishings did not go unnoticed, and I felt like every aspect of my comfort had been considered.
I would also like to commend your team for their excellent customer service. They were always ready to assist with any inquiries and went above and beyond to ensure that my needs were met promptly and with a smile.

Overall, my experience at your hotel was outstanding, and I will certainly recommend it to friends, family, and colleagues. Thank you for providing such a wonderful environment and for your commitment to excellence. I look forward to the opportunity to stay at your hotel.

Regards,
Simran Sadana

We greatly appreciate your commendation of our team's customer service. Your recommendation to friends, family, and colleagues is the highest compliment. We can't wait to welcome you back for another outstanding experience.

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id:
Hotel Belmont was conveniently located to a variety of local attractions.  It's a clean place and the room although small was well appointed.  Don't expect to do push ups on the limited floor space.
The lounge was nice for a drink or breakfast.
The best part of our stay was the amazingly helpful,  friendly staff. They all went out of their way to be kind and to be sure we were happy with our vacation.

Thank you for your wonderful review! We're glad you found our location convenient and enjoyed our well-appointed rooms. Our team is thrilled to have made your stay special. If you're looking for more space on your next visit, we have other room types available. We'd love to ensure your future stay is even more comfortable and enjoyable. Looking forward to welcoming you back!

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id: Was located in a great location downtown, very clean and well decorated which made the stay quite enjoyable! Lobby smelled quite strongly of perfume, but otherwise the stay was very good. Wish we had been  back during the right hours for the complimentary drinks but that was cool to receive!

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id:
Location was nice and was very clean. The staff were also quite friendly and helpful.
But the place was EXTREMELY small. If you just want a place to crash after getting some drinks sure. But for what you pay one would hope there would be more things in the room, or that the size would be bigger.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Location was nice and was very clean. The staff were also quite friendly and helpful.
But the place was EXTREMELY small. If you just want a place to crash after getting some drinks sure. But for what you pay one would hope there would be more things in the room, or that the size would be bigger.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Emmett, 

Thank you for your feedback! We're glad you appreciated our location, cleanliness, and our friendly staff. We understand your concerns about the room size and amenities. We do offer a variety of room categories, some of which are more spacious and offer additional features. For your next stay, we'd be delighted to assist you in choosing a room category that better suits your preferences and ensures a more comfortable experience. Please reach out to us directly, and we'll ensure your next stay exceeds your expectations.

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id: The front desk service was exceedingly helpful and the room was very clean.The breakfast buffet area was also very clean and there was better than average selection.
